content: crochet mandala chevron blanket - the chevron pattern of this blanket really give it a wow look the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 size approx - 32 x 38 inches level intermediate copyright ©2023 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/mandala-chevron-crochet-blanket/
